As the plant takes root in the soil, so we are to take deep root in Christ. As the plant receives the sunshine, the dew, and the rain, we are to open our hearts to the Holy Spirit. The work is to be done "not by might, nor by power, but by my Spirit, saith the Lord of hosts" (Zechariah 4:6) (ibid., p. 67).
